bug.author: NextBG
bug.summary: Missing a letter "g" in article <<Permanently Set OpenVINO™ Environment Variables for Windows® 10>>
bug.description:
On tutorial Permanently Set OpenVINO™ Environment Variables for Windows® 10, <denchmark-link:https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/support/articles/000033440/boards-and-kits/neural-compute-sticks.html>https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/support/articles/000033440/boards-and-kits/neural-compute-sticks.html</denchmark-link>
There is a line %INTEL_OPENVINO_DIR%\deployment_tools\inference_engine\bin\intel64\Debu missing a "g". <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49566324/81965531-c11ef800-964a-11ea-913c-742c6353b02e.PNG></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NextBG>@NextBG</denchmark-link> this typo has been addressed in document, update should reflect in document shortly. Thanks for reporting this.
